Action.body: USER includes new parameter to indicate chaincodes and collections for the proposal ** NodeSDK checks discovery cache based on call parameters and age and if not found or aged out ** NodeSDK will do a new discovery query with all new and known chaincodes and collections to refresh the cache Note: this does assume that the discovery results are returned in the same order as the request ** NodeSDK will send endorsements based on the latest endorsement plan . >
